articles.author: INDIATODAY
articles.title: Smriti Mandhana makes history in Women’s internationals - India Today
articles.description: Smriti Mandhana completed 7000 international runs when India Women and South Africa Women played in the first ODI.
articles.content: Mandhana went past the legendary Meg Lanning, who got to the milestone at the age of 29 years and 13 days
